description: This file defines the PollListAdapter class, which is used to adapt a list of Poll objects for display in a RecyclerView in an Android application. It handles creating view holders, binding data to views, and managing click events on individual polls.

classes.name: PollListAdapter
classes.description: Adapter class to bind a list of Poll objects to a RecyclerView for display.

classes.name: PollViewHolder
classes.description: ViewHolder class for holding the views of a single poll item.

methods.name: PollListAdapter
methods.description: Constructor to initialize the adapter with a list of polls and a click listener.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates a new ViewHolder by inflating the item view layout.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds a Poll object to the view holder, updating UI components and setting click listeners.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of polls in the list.

methods.name: PollViewHolder
methods.description: Initializes view references for a poll item.
